keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Jacques Bihozagara’s death is under investigation at a time of escalating tensions between Burundi and Rwanda.

headline.print_headline: Retired Rwanda Politician Dies While Jailed in Burundi as Spy
headline.main: Retired Rwanda Politician Dies While Jailed in Burundi as a Spy

snippet: Jacques Bihozagara’s death is under investigation at a time of escalating tensions between Burundi and Rwanda.
abstract: Retired Rwandan government official Jacques Bihozagara dies in Burundian jail after being detained on espionage charges; Rwanda questions circumstances of official's death, raising tensions with its neighbor Burundi, which has been roiled by recent unrest.
